create.title: !event create
create.description: Starts the event creation process. Prepare for bot DMs aplenty.

list.title: !event list
list.description: Lists all events for the server (no duplicates for repeat events)

join.title: !event "<event name>" join
join.description: Marks you as an attendee for the event.

assign.title: !event "<event name>" assign <@user> to "<assignment/task>"
assign.description: Assigns the specified user to the specified assignment. Use 'me' to assign yourself.

task.title: !event "<event name>" (task | job | assignment) create "<assignment name>"
task.description: Creates a new assignment for the specified event

listTasks.title: !event "<event name>" (jobs | joblist | assignments)
listTasks.description: Lists all the assignments for the given event.

eventEdit.title: !event "<event name>" edit
eventEdit.description: Starts the event edit process. Prepare for more bot DMs.

delete.title: !event "<event id>" delete
delete.description: Ruins all the fun for everyone by killing the event
